Universal Containers (UC) offers several enterprise server bundles with professional services. UC has a large catalog of professional services that are compatible with any server. New professional services are constantly being introduced. UC wants to design the product configuration to minimize maintenance and ensure scalability.

Which two actions should the admin take to construct these new bundles? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Create a new Custom Action that is filtered to show only Professional Services Products.
choices.B: Create a Filter Product Rule with a Product Action filtering for Professional Services Products.
choices.A: Create a Dynamic Feature for Professional Services Products.
choices.C: Create a nested bundle that contains all Professional Services Products.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
A,B works here. Dynamic features work with filter product rules to limit products that are selectable.
